Reviews.Title: into twentieth century & beyond
Reviews.Author: danaraye
Reviews.Content: sturdy feel..yet sleek handling! Over all performance so far is 100 percent!! I'm hard on phones & this one seemingly can go the distance

Reviews.Title: New in retail packaging and works fine.
Reviews.Author: JonW
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an identical one I'd had for 1-1/2 years and then lost. I called NET10 and they transferred my number and remaining time and minutes over from the lost one.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Leslie S
Reviews.Content: Just as described, new in sealed packaging. The phone works great and has tons of features for not being a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the right user.
Reviews.Author: M. Clark
Reviews.Content: This is NOT a smartphone.  You will never want to connect to the internet with this phone!  This phone, however, is great for anyone who wants good call quality, a reasonably sized querty keyboard for texting and low cost cell phone/texting.  I purposely bought this model, because the keyboard is a little bit bigger than some.  The one I  bought has Verizon service.  -The C means CDMA.  This may depend on your zip code when you set it up.  If you buy minutes online at Net10, you can get about 1500 minutes for $100.  That is a great deal for my parents, who are not huge cell users.  They spend about $15 a month with Net 10, and since their minutes roll over, they have about 5000 minutes on their phone right now!  Same with my mother in law.Net10 pay as you go tip, never buy a used phone, and you will greatly reduce your chance of having problems!  This advice does not apply to smart phones bring your own phone.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ns
Reviews.Content: ringtone could be louder. Cant hear it or sometimes it don't go off at all!! Hope it improves.. That's the only thing I don't like.

Reviews.Title: The tracfone Net 10 works great for me.
Reviews.Author: Livier G.
Reviews.Content: I have used it for 1 month and it meets my expectations. I  use it to send text messages and keep the conversations short. I like the fact that I do not have a contract and I can add minutes if needed. The cell reception works great.

Reviews.Title: Just Right!
Reviews.Author: Richard Robletto
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I needed, the text is large and bright, the texting is easy and I didn't want a touch phone. Thank you already two others who have seen my phone ordered one and are just as pleased with it as I am. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Was a gift
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I don't know first hand but the person I gave it to really likes this phone.  It was exactly what she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, But Not Straighttalk Compatible
Reviews.Author: Bubba
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to be a great product. I was just disappointed because I was under the impression that it could be used with Straighttalk.
